mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods ( goodsNum, goodsName, cateCode, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDesc ) values ( tbl_goods_seq.nextval, #{goodsName}, #{cateCode}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsStock}, #{goodsDesc} )
mapper.select: select goodsNum, goodsName, cateCode, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDesc, goodsImg, goodsDate from tbl_goods order by goodsNum desc
select goodsNum, goodsName, cateCode, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDesc, goodsImg, goodsDate from tbl_goods where goodsNum = #{goodsNum}
